GENERAL FEATURES.Business Features: Document Viewer, Pushmail  (Microsoft Exchange ActiveSync), Reader Mode

Platform.OS: Android v4.2 (Jelly Bean), Upgradable to v4.4 (KitKat)

Display.Other Display Features: TRILUMINOS Display with X-Reality, OptiContrast Panel, Dust-resistant (IP55 and IP58), Sony BRAVIA Engine, Waterproof (IP55 and IP58)

Camera.Other Camera Features: Social Camera Applications, Sony G Lens, Advanced Optics Lens, Exmor RS Sony Image Sensor, BIONZ Sony Processing Engine, Unparalleled Photos and Video, Zoom - 3x, Cyber-shot, Low Noise, Video Image Stabiliser, Viewfinder, Social Live, Info-eye, Timeshift Burst, AR Effect, HDR for Photo and Video

Internet & Connectivity.Bluetooth: Yes, v4, Supported Profiles (PMPOLE 1.0, OPP 1.1, GAPC / LE, DIP 1.3, PAP 1.1, AVRCP 1.3, A2DP 1.2, MAP 1.0, HFP 1.6, HSP 1.2, HIDP, HDP 1.1, PANP 1.0, HR 1.1, SPP 1.1)

Multimedia.Sound Enhancement: Noise Suppression, Voice Enhancement, PlayStation Certified, Sony Entertainment Network, 3D Surround Sound, Clear Audio+, TrackID Music Recognition, xLoud Experience
Multimedia.Video Player: Yes, Supports WEBM, MP4, XviD, M4V, MKV, AVI, 3GPP, Full HD

Other Features.Additional Features: Pair with Magnetic Charging Dock DK31 with No Need to Open a USB Cap, STAMINA Mode Battery, Micro HDMI Support, Audio Streaming, Video Streaming, MHL Connectivity, NFC Support, Screen Mirroring, Voice Input, TV Out Port
Other Features.Important Apps: Google Play, Sony Music App, Sony Entertainment Television, Sony Pictures, BIGFlix, Asphalt 7, LINE, Album App, Movies App, WALKMAN App, Social Life
Other Features.Sensors: Ambient Light Sensor, eCompass, Magnetometer, Accelerometer, Proximity Sensor, Gyroscope

Warranty.Warranty Summary: 1 year manufacturer warranty for Phone and 6 months warranty for in the box accessories
